heroAbout.title: About us
heroAbout.subtitle1: Argatio is a real estate platform that combines the traditional world with the cutting-edge technology of blockchain. We aim to revolutionize real estate investment, making it accessible and equitable for everyone. We strive to open up investment opportunities that were once restricted to an exclusive circle, democratizing access to the real estate market on a global scale. mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to democratize access to homeownership by integrating tokenization and innovative leasing options.

ourTeam.title: Our team
ourTeam.description: We firmly believe that the key to success lies in people. Therefore, we focus on bringing together the best talents, passionate and committed professionals, ready to tackle and overcome the challenges of the dynamic real estate world.

elements.text1: We convert properties into digital fractions for investment and shared ownership.
elements.text2: Tenants can gradually become owners by paying a leasing fee that turns into an investment.
elements.text3: With each payment, tenants acquire property tokens, progressing towards full ownership.
